## Description

The goal of the R package `vegetR` is to help loading and merging data set from
quantitative vegetation inventories, such as forest plots. It provides field 
equivalencies for exchangin data using adpated VegX standards.


## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("LimaRAF/vegetR")
```

Then you can attach the package `vegetR`:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library("vegetR")
```
